mapper.select: SELECT c.product_id, c.product_name, c.register_year, c.product_price, c.product_stock, c.product_discount, c.color_codes, c.cate_code, c.reg_date, c.update_date, i.image_url FROM fm_cloth c LEFT JOIN ( SELECT product_id, image_url FROM fm_image WHERE image_order = 1 ) i ON c.product_id = i.product_id

SELECT c.product_id, c.product_name, c.register_year, c.product_price, c.product_stock, c.product_discount, c.color_codes, c.cate_code, c.reg_date, c.update_date, i.image_url FROM fm_cloth c LEFT JOIN ( SELECT product_id, image_url FROM fm_image WHERE image_order = 1 ) i ON c.product_id = i.product_id WHERE c.cate_code IN ( SELECT cate_code FROM fm_category WHERE parent_code = 'OUTER' )

SELECT c.product_id, c.product_name, c.register_year, c.product_price, c.product_stock, c.product_discount, c.color_codes, c.cate_code, c.reg_date, c.update_date, i.image_url FROM fm_cloth c LEFT JOIN ( SELECT product_id, image_url FROM fm_image WHERE image_order = 1 ) i ON c.product_id = i.product_id WHERE c.cate_code IN ( SELECT cate_code FROM fm_category WHERE parent_code = 'TOP' )

SELECT c.product_id, c.product_name, c.register_year, c.product_price, c.product_stock, c.product_discount, c.color_codes, c.cate_code, c.reg_date, c.update_date, i.image_url FROM fm_cloth c LEFT JOIN ( SELECT product_id, image_url FROM fm_image WHERE image_order = 1 ) i ON c.product_id = i.product_id WHERE c.cate_code IN ( SELECT cate_code FROM fm_category WHERE parent_code = 'BOTTOM' )

SELECT c.product_id, c.product_name, c.register_year, c.product_price, c.product_stock, c.product_discount, c.color_codes, c.cate_code, c.reg_date, c.update_date, i.image_url FROM fm_cloth c LEFT JOIN ( SELECT product_id, image_url FROM fm_image WHERE image_order = 1 ) i ON c.product_id = i.product_id WHERE c.cate_code IN ( SELECT cate_code FROM fm_category WHERE parent_code = 'ETC' )

SELECT c.product_id, c.product_name, c.register_year, c.product_price, c.product_stock, c.product_discount, c.color_codes, c.cate_code, c.reg_date, c.update_date, i.image_url, i.image_order FROM fm_cloth c LEFT JOIN fm_image i ON c.product_id = i.product_id WHERE c.product_id = #{productId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO fm_cloth (product_name, register_year, product_price, product_stock, product_discount, color_codes, cate_code) VALUES (#{productName}, #{registerYear}, #{productPrice}, #{productStock}, #{productDiscount}, #{colorCodes}, #{cateCode});
INSERT INTO fm_image (product_id, image_url, image_order) VALUES (#{productId}, #{imageUrl}, #{imageOrder});
